message: Whenever I use convore, I'm hopping around between rooms. As a result, the room the bell sounds in, when I'm in another tab, is rarely the most interesting of the rooms.
...and also have a per-group sound setting
actually I have another idea...how about being able to turn on the sound on a per-room basis, so whenever you're logged into convore, you here the sound, regardless of what room you're in
Would be nice to have a setting for sound so you can keep it a persistent state.
